# tvOS 18.5 Release Notes

**Article**

Update your apps to use new features, and test your apps against API changes.

## Overview

The tvOS 18.5 SDK provides support to develop tvOS apps for Apple TV devices running tvOS 18.5. The SDK comes bundled with Xcode 16.4, available from the Mac App Store. For information on the compatibility requirements for Xcode 16.4, see [/documentation/Xcode-Release-Notes/xcode-16_4-release-notes].

### StoreKit

#### Resolved Issues

- Fixed: Calling `isEligibleForIntroOffer(for:)` will return false if there is no user account signed in.  (146119524)

## tvOS 18

- **tvOS 18.6 Release Notes**: Update your apps to use new features, and test your apps against API changes.
- **tvOS 18.4 Release Notes**: Update your apps to use new features, and test your apps against API changes.
- **tvOS 18.3 Release Notes**: Update your apps to use new features, and test your apps against API changes.
- **tvOS 18.2 Release Notes**: Update your apps to use new features, and test your apps against API changes.
- **tvOS 18.1 Release Notes**: Update your apps to use new features, and test your apps against API changes.
- **tvOS 18 Release Notes**: Update your apps to use new features, and test your apps against API changes.
